Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.Entity

    Serializable

    public class World
extends Entity
implements Serializable
    Container for all the visible objects in a scene.
    Author:
    danroyer

      • findPhysicalObjectsNear

        public List<PhysicalObject> findPhysicalObjectsNear(javax.vecmath.Point3d target,
                                                    double radius)
        Find all Entities within epsilon mm of pose. TODO Much optimization could be done here to reduce the search time.
        Parameters:
        target - the center of the cube around which to search.
        radius - the maximum distance to search for entities.
        Returns:
        a list of found PhysicalObjects
